text: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time
author: Steve Jobs

text: Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Life is a series of choices.
author: Nostrodamus

text: And if you gaze long into an abyss, the abyss also gazes into you.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: To be, or not to be: that is the question.
author: William Shakespeare

text: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
author: Marylin Monroe

text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein
